name: metadata
description: General information associated with a UDM event.

children.name: event_timestamp
children.description: The GMT timestamp when the event was generated.

children.name: vendor_name
children.description: The name of the product vendor.

children.name: product_event_type
children.description: A product-specific event name or type.

children.name: product_deployment_id
children.description: The deployment identifier assigned by the vendor for a product deployment.

children.name: description
children.description: A human-readable description of the event.
